item.title: Founders Award Nomintations Due
item.description: Date: Monday, August 4, 2025 - Fri , August 29, 2025 (all day) - The Founders Award of Excellence was established in 1994 to honor students who embody the qualities of creativity, discovery, and leadership, and the values of pride and responsibility at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. Eligible nominees must be enrolled as a sophomore, junior, senior, fifth-year architecture student, or graduate student in the fall semester of 2025. item.title: Rensselaer at Work Analytics, Machine Learning & AI Review | Aug. 15
item.description: Date: Friday, August 15, 2025 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Join Rensselaer at Work Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., on a 30-minute information session highlighting Rensselaer online, project-based graduate certificate programs in Analytics, Machine Learning & AI. Expect to learn how data can inform better decisions and review an analytic method that can be used regardless of the tools at hand. Please register if you plan to attend.

item.title: JEC walkway underpass roadway closure until 8/29/25
item.description: The project has come across an unexpected issue and will require adding additional shoring to be installed while structural repairs are being addressed on the underside of the bridge. This will result in the closure of the underpass under the bridge until 8/29/25. We are doing this now so that the underpass can be restrictively (closed during working hours, open nights weekends) and reopened before the Sage Ave. entrance closure on 9/8/25.
